Title: Ella's Taste Test
Description:
Well, I finally got the brew made, but I won't know if it's any good unless some people taste it.

Would you take my brew and see what the folks in Halfhill think?

I... I couldn't face them myself.
ObjectivesText: Ask Jogu the Drunk, Bobo Ironpaw, Farmer Yoon, and Nana Mudclaw what they think of Ella's Brew.
